title: Bug 13196[Browsing] Consequences of changes
OB: When performing manipulations in the presence of an open editor, the behavior differs between manipulations. Some manipulations do not work as expected on the working copy shown in the editor.
EB: Both manipulations should exhibit consistent behavior. Specifically, if there is an open editor, all manipulations should work seamlessly on the working copy displayed in the editor.
SR: Ensure that manipulations on the working copy, with an open editor, consistently produce the expected results without any discrepancies.
